sources.title: The Young Land
sources.description: An American gunslinger (Dennis Hopper) kills a Mexican man in California immediately after the Mexican-American war. The killer is arrested and put on trial for murder with the Hispanic population waiting to learn of American justice.

sources.title: The Young Land (1959) DENNIS HOPPERüçï PATRICK WAYNE
sources.description:
It's Friday @PizzaFLIX 
Stars: Dennis Hopper, Patrick Wayne, Yvonne Craig
Music Score: Dimitri Tiomkin 
Director: Ted Tetzlaff

In the wake of the 1848 Treaty of Guadalupe Hidalgo, racial tension is at boiling point when a trigger-happy gunslinger murders a Mexican Vaquereo in the newly acquired territory of California.

üçïTRIVIA: This is the 3rd and final film produced by Philanthropist Cornelius Vanderbilt Whitney in what he called his ‚ÄúAmerican Series.‚Äù The other 2 films are The Searchers (1956), directed by John Ford, starring John Wayne, and The Missouri Traveler (1958), starring Lee Marvin and Brandon DeWIldeüçï

metadata.Plot: An American gunslinger kills a Mexican man in California immediately after the Mexican-American war. The killer is arrested and put on trial for murder with the Hispanic population waiting to learn of American justice.
metadata.Actors: Patrick Wayne, Yvonne Craig, Dennis Hopper
